name: Winky Blinky (4kb C64 game)
description:
Okay, I decided to add this daft little game I did for the 2016 Craptastic 4kb game compo.
This game's filesize was just under 4 kilobytes.

What's the aim of the game?

Well, you just need to react to Ben's eye winks or blinks, but you must be quick.

If he winks, you push left, if he blinks, you push right. Each time you choose correctly, you get a point. It's that simple.

Just a daft highscore chaser, but it's not as easy as it looks.

Code and graphics: Me
Music, Music player and additional graphics: Vanja Utne.

This game can be downloaded for free, but if you would like to donate, that's cool. When the pool reaches $100 it will go to charity.
